fields.name: additional_answer_count
fields.comment: Number of entries in the 'additional' section of the DNS message.

fields.name: answer
fields.comment: Resolved address for the query.

fields.name: answer_count
fields.comment: Number of entries in the answer section of the DNS message.

fields.name: authority_answer_count
fields.comment: Number of entries in the 'authority' section of the DNS message.

fields.name: dest
fields.comment: The destination of the network resolution event. You can alias this from more specific fields, such as dest_host, dest_ip, or dest_name.

fields.name: message_type
fields.comment: Type of DNS message.

fields.name: query
fields.comment: The domain which needs to be resolved. Applies to messages of type 'Query'.

fields.name: query_count
fields.comment: Number of entries that appear in the 'Questions' section of the DNS query.

fields.name: query_type
fields.comment: The field may contain DNS OpCodes or Resource Record Type codes. For details, see the Domain Name System Parameters on the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) web site. If a value is not set, the DNS.record_type field is referenced.

fields.name: record_type
fields.comment: The DNS resource record type. For details, see the List of DNS record types on Wikipedia.

fields.name: reply_code
fields.comment: The return code for the response. For details, see the Domain Name System Parameters on the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) web site.

fields.name: reply_code_id
fields.comment: The numerical id or name of a return code. For details, see the Domain Name System Parameters on the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) web site.

fields.name: response_time
fields.comment: The amount of time it took to receive a response in the network resolution event, in seconds.

fields.name: src
fields.comment: The source of the network resolution event. You can alias this from more specific fields, such as src_host, src_ip, or src_name.

fields.name: transaction_id
fields.comment: The unique numerical transaction id of the network resolution event

fields.name: transport
fields.comment: The transport protocol used by the network resolution event.

fields.name: duration
fields.comment: The time taken by the network resolution event, in seconds.

fields.name: name
fields.comment: The name of the DNS event.

fields.name: ttl
fields.comment: The time-to-live of the network resolution event, in seconds.

fields.name: vendor_product
fields.comment: The vendor product name of the DNS server. The Splunk platform can derive this field from the fields vendor and product in the raw data, if they exist.
